hiveArticle.title: 50% SBD is not receiving when Reward dropdown changed
hiveArticle.body:
So in one of the [Utopian.io post](https://steemit.com/utopian-io/@codingdefined/development-contribution-for-the-search-in-utopian) I have changed the Reward from 100% Steem Power to 50% SBD and 50% SP. But when I got the payout it was not 50% SBD and 50% SP. The Post : https://steemit.com/utopian-io/@codingdefined/development-contribution-for-the-search-in-utopian Reward Payout from Steemd - 0.118 SBD and 51.962 SP whereas total Author Payout was $47.40. ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1511179479/sgb892crzo3kdxextpss.png) ![image.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1511179825/ee6fheded1or1jrae9dz.png) ### Steps to Reroduce 1. Create a post from Utopian.io and change the Reward to 50% SBD and 50% SP. 2. Wait for 7 days till you get the payout. 3. The SBD and SP received has a huge difference and they are not 50%. ### Browser: Chrome
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors
